entities.description: The unmet need for substance use treatment.
Lack of health insurance coverage for substance use treatment.
Health insurance not covering enough cost for substance use treatment.
Lack of knowledge on how to obtain substance use treatment.
Inability to find a preferred provider for substance use treatment.
No available openings with the preferred provider for substance use treatment.

relationships.description: Indicates an unmet need for treatment due to lack of health insurance coverage.
Indicates an unmet need for treatment due to insufficient health insurance coverage.
Indicates an unmet need for treatment due to a lack of knowledge on how to get treatment.
Indicates an unmet need for treatment due to inability to find a preferred provider.
Indicates an unmet need for treatment due to no available openings with the preferred provider.
